channel.title: Need help! about adding admin
channel.description: i went to server tutorial and i port forwarded and players can come in but i donno where do i put the admine code thing to client.java and where is client java lol can some one help me1! :(

ugh, why do you even help him? hes just a leecher.

item.title: Need help! about adding admin
item.dc:creator: @Linkel Linkel
item.description:
@Linkel wrote:

[quote=“Dan1337, post:2, topic:139949”]howbout you learn to code?
adding admins is incredibly easy, so you must either be stupid or lazy? Possibly blind?
it is not in your client.java, but if you cant even find your client.java, forget about adding admins.
youll most likely forget how to breath and eat within a few moments, if you havent already.[/quote]
l0l.

Once you’ve logged in once, go to your characters folder, open up the user you want to change player rights for, and where it says ‘character-rights = 0’, change it to 1 for mod, 2 for admin, 3 for owner.

Close your server, compile, run again.

Read full topic
